segments.text: The children are wrapped up in their own little world, completely detached from reality.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of happiness wash over me as I see their excitement for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, that joy is quickly overshadowed by the danger of the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the chaos of the kitchen and the still garden outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how often we overlook simple dangers when caught up in our daily routines.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s humorous, almost, how oblivious the woman is to everything going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, something in my gut tells me this level of distraction will not end well.
segments.speaker: PAR
